text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's almost time for training! I'm gonna do my best today too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: W-w-where did it come from!? Please vacate the premises promptly—!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Huh, it's not moving...? Maybe it's a spider toy? If so, it's not scary but—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Gyaaah!! It twitched! It's a real spider after all! No way—!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Ugh... It's by the door, so I can't get out...
Matikanetannhauser couldn't leave the room for a while and ended up skipping training.
